Title: Provider workflows: create/edit activities and drafts

Description:
Add provider-specific features: create/edit provider profiles, create activity and competition drafts, publish workflow, and manage drafts.

Acceptance criteria:
- Backend: provider endpoints and draft persistence.
- Frontend: provider dashboard to create/edit drafts and publish.
- Permissions: only provider role can access provider endpoints.

Labels: enhancement, backend, frontend
Estimate: L
